body{background:#211a16;overflow:hidden}.image{max-width:600px;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.image:active{transition:1.5s;max-width:100%;max-height:100%}.text{top:9%}.text,.text2{position:absolute;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.text2{display:none;top:10%}.input1{background:azure;width:200px;height:29px;border-radius:4px;left:50%;margin-right:-50%}.button,.input1{position:fixed;opacity:.7;top:20%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.button{border-radius:3px;cursor:pointer;background:#f0f8ff;font-weight:700;width:70px;height:27px;left:40%;margin-right:-40%}.button:hover{transition:1s;opacity:.5}.col{width:240px;background:azure;flex:2;flex-direction:column;align-items:flex-end;padding:0;border-radius:3px}.button2,.col{cursor:pointer}.button2{padding:2px;border:4px;border-radius:5px;margin-left:17px;margin-bottom:6px}.button2:hover{opacity:.8}.button3{margin-left:20px;background:#000;color:#fff;border-radius:6px;height:25px;width:270px;cursor:pointer;z-index:1}.updateText{background:#000;width:330px;opacity:.2}*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box;outline:none}.main{display:flex;justify-content:flex-end;align-items:center;padding:20px;overflow:hidden;transform:translateY(30px) translateX(-160px)}.settings{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between;width:200px}.slider{width:100%;color:#ccc}.iconLeft:hover{opacity:.8}.slider input{width:100%}.slider2{overflow:hidden;-webkit-appearance:none;height:7px;background-color:#6e6e6e;border-radius:10px}.slider2:hover{background-color:#708090}.hide{display:none}.btn{display:inline-block;padding:1rem 2.3rem;margin-bottom:0;font-weight:400;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;line-height:1.3rem;text-align:center;white-space:nowrap;vertical-align:middle;touch-action:manipulation;cursor:pointer;user-select:none;background:#000;color:#ccc;border:none;border-radius:.6rem;transition:transform .2s ease-in-out,box-shadow .2s ease-in-out,-webkit-transform .2s ease-in-out,-webkit-box-shadow .2s ease-in-out;will-change:transform}.btn:disabled{background:rgba(2,2,2,.7);cursor:not-allowed}.btn:active{transition:transform .1s ease-in-out,box-shadow .1s ease-in-out;transform:none;box-shadow:none}.btn:hover:not(:disabled){box-shadow:0 6px 16px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2);transform:translateY(-1px)}.black{background:rgba(2,3,3,.4);height:800px;width:300px;z-index:-1;transform:translateY(-640px)}.removeBtn{background:rgba(7,7,7,.8);width:350px;height:35px;z-index:2;color:#ccc;border-radius:4px;border:4px;transform:translateX(582px) translateY(55px);cursor:pointer}.removeBtn:hover{opacity:.8}.end{transform:translateY(160px);justify-content:center;align-items:center;width:520%;display:flex;height:70px;background:rgba(0,0,0,.5);z-index:100}.endTitle{font-size:1rem;color:#ccc}
/*!**! popup*/.popup{position:fixed;width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.9);top:0;left:0;opacity:0;z-index:2000;visibility:hidden;transition:all .8s ease 0s}.popup.open{opacity:1;visibility:visible}.popup.open .popup_content{transform:perspective(600px) translate(0) rotateX(0deg)}.popup_body{min-height:100%;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;padding:30px 20px}.popup_content{background-color:rgba(1,2,1,.1);opacity:.8;color:#fff;max-width:500px;padding:10px}.popup_close{position:absolute;right:10px;top:10px;font-size:29px}.popup_title{text-align:center;justify-content:center;font-size:30px}.popup_area{position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;top:0;left:0}.popupButton.popup-link{position:fixed;height:100%;width:300px;z-index:13;transition:1s;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:3px 3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5);justify-content:flex-end;align-items:flex-end;transform:translateY(-110px)}
